Rainbow Breeze

• 1 cup pineapple juice
• 1/2 cup orange juice
• 1/4 cup grenadine syrup
• 1/4 cup blue curaçao syrup (non-alcoholic)
• Ice cubes
• Fresh fruit for garnish (berries, pineapple, orange)

Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Pour pineapple and orange juice, then slowly add grenadine to create a gradient. Top with blue curaçao syrup. Garnish with fresh fruit skewer. Serve immediately and enjoy the tropical paradise!
Sunrise Sparkle

• 2 oz fresh orange juice
• 1 oz pomegranate juice
• 1 oz lemon juice
• Sparkling water
• Ice cubes
• Maraschino cherry for garnish

In a champagne flute, combine orange and pomegranate juice. Add ice and top with sparkling water. Slowly pour lemon juice to create a sunrise effect. Garnish with a maraschino cherry. Perfect for celebrations!
Blue Lagoon Mocktail

• 2 oz blue curaçao syrup (non-alcoholic)
• 3 oz lemonade
• 1 oz coconut water
• Ice cubes
• Lemon slice for garnish
Fill a glass with ice cubes. Pour blue curaçao syrup and coconut water. Top with lemonade and stir gently. Garnish with a lemon slice. Transport yourself to a tropical island with every sip!
Watermelon Sunset

• 1 cup fresh watermelon juice
• 1/2 cup orange juice
• 1 tbsp lime juice
• Ice cubes
• Lime wheel for garnish
• Mint leaves

Blend fresh watermelon to make juice. In a glass filled with ice, combine watermelon juice, orange juice, and lime juice. Stir well. Garnish with lime wheel and fresh mint leaves. Refreshing and hydrating!
Virgin Mojito

• 10 fresh mint leaves
• 1/2 lime, cut into wedges
• 2 tbsp white sugar
• 1 cup ice cubes
• 1/2 cup soda water
• Mint sprig and lime for garnish
Muddle mint leaves, lime wedges, and sugar in a glass. Fill with ice cubes. Pour soda water and stir well. Garnish with mint sprig and lime wedge. Classic refreshment for any occasion!
